metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1248 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in OTRS AG OTRS (Ticket Actions modules), OTRS AG ((OTRS)) Community Edition (Ticket Actions modules) allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects OTRS: from 7.0.X before 7.0.42; ((OTRS)) Community Edition: from 6.0.1 through 6.0.34.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
